---
title: "Course materials"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(knitr); library(kableExtra)
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r}
f  <- list.files("hw", pattern='*.Rmd')
f <- f[!grepl("solutions", f )]
hw <- data.frame(filenames = paste0('hw/', f ))


out.hw <- hw %>% mutate(name = gsub("hw/|.Rmd",  "", filenames), 
                        link = sprintf("[%s](%s)",name, filenames))

```

# Assignments

To download RMD template files, right click and "save as". Do not open in a browser then save. 
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
x = out.hw %>% select(name, link) %>%
    kable(format="html") %>%
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive" ,"bordered"), 
                  full_width=FALSE,  position = "left")
#gsub("<thead>.*</thead>", "", x)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE, results='asis'}
paste0("<li>", sprintf("[%s](%s)",toupper(out.hw$name), out.hw$filenames), "</li>")
```
